content: row 6 i just realized by looking at the picture below that i ve messed in the previous row grey by working a couple of double_crochet by the end instead of the trebles so please don t get confused color a row 9 & 10 chain 1 and turn starting from the 1st st of the row work 1 bl double_crochet in every st across in the end of row 10 change to color b 216 color b row 11 repeat row 5 in the end of the row change to color d 216 color d row 12 repeat row 5 in the end of the row change to color a 216 color a row 13 & 14 chain 1 and turn starting from the 1st st of the row work 1 bl double_crochet in every st across in the end of row 14 change to color c 216 9 enid s snood by kiki crochet patterns copyright 2023 color c row 15 19 chain 1 and turn starting from the 1st st of the row work 1 bl double_crochet in every st across in the end of row 19 change to color a 216 color a row 20 chain 2 and turn work 1 half_double_crochet in the 1st st continue by working 1 fpdc around the next 214 st the 1st pic shows how your 1st two fpdc will look like and the 2nd pic shows how the opposite side when we turn the work will look in the end 10 enid s snood by kiki crochet patterns copyright 2023 finish row by working 1 half_double_crochet in the last st 216 row 21 chain 1 and turn starting from the 1st st of the row work 1 bl double_crochet in every st across in the end of row 21 change to color c 216 color c row 22 chain 2 and turn work 1 half_double_crochet in the 1st st 11 enid s snood by kiki crochet patterns copyright 2023 continue by working 1 fpdc around the next 214 st the 1st pic shows how the first fpdc s will look like and the 2nd pic shows how the opposite side when we turn the work will look in the end finish row by working 1 half_double_crochet in the last st 216 12 enid s snood by kiki crochet patterns copyright 2023 chain 1 cut the yarn and fasten_off weave in all of your ends this is how the infinity scarf should look like at this point 13 enid s snood by kiki crochet patterns copyright 2023 assembly 1 fold the scarf in half making sure that the side where the outlines from the fpdc that we worked in the last row are facing down 2 take the top piece twist it once place it back down making sure it aligns correctly with the back piece 14 enid s snood by kiki crochet patterns copyright 2023 3 turn the work so the 2 ends are on top so we can
